website_summaries.verdict: The DJI Mavic 2 Pro is the best small drone on the market, with superior image and video quality, obstacle avoidance, and excellent battery life.

customer_reviews.title: Best "toy" ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow, this is awesome, I can fly hahahahahahaha. So simple to use and idiot proof almost. Yes you could still stack it but you have to be sensible as it costs so much. Really really recommend this drone. its my first ever drone and i am over the moon. You will need 2 extra batteries, you think you wont but you will, just to keep flying whilst other charges. 1/2 hour battery life goes quick if your learning. Im still learning controls but have picked up speed now, next to master the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Suffolk through and through

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Suck! DJI Rock!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this doesn’t get 5 stars is because amazon support in replacing the item was non-existent. There is an issue with this drone that does not allow the update work. Dji were great and said sent it to amazon for replacement. Amazon said fine. We’ll let you know in 48 hours regarding the replacement. After waiting and then chasing they said no we can’t replace just return. But having used this drone. When it works it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: NikitaHarte

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quality Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone. Initially bought the Mavic Mini but soon yearned for the upgraded camera and software package. Bought this with the Fly More Combo. Easy to fly, quality build and excellent software. Flew for the first time last night, got 27 minutes flying time on one battery. Took some superb RAW images. Will test the video on the next non stormy day. Highly recommended if you can justify the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Used/refurb drone sold as new
customer_reviews.text: I bought the drone as new but it is not. In fact, I have found photos and videos memorized in the internal memory. It is clear that they are not demos and that they were taken by a private citizen while in his house and in his garden. Since images of people are covered by the Data Protection Act, there is a clear privacy issue here related to those photos and videos. I have seen private contents that, of course, I am not responsible for. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: What more can you need? Great Drone and great software.
customer_reviews.text: Fab fab fab ... amazing machine and easy to use. However buying from Amazon and DJI Europe seems to give you no VAT to reclaim if it's a business purchase. Either DJI or Amazon are overcharging as it should be less with no VAT... Watch out for the VAT trap. and tax cheaters.
customer_reviews.author: chrism

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good drone but buy new not secondhand
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, Crazy high wind outside today. Fiddled around with the axis gimbal in settings so no more shakes and sorting out updates. This machine is amazing and the shots you get are sweet, thanks for getting it here so fast. Iv had to lower the stars, it still has the shakes on the gimbal updates haven’t fixed nor calibration (to be fair it’s secondhand) but i really need it for filming work. Next time I’ll buy new to be sure, just means it’ll take longer to save some more.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Davies

customer_reviews.title: Hangars Autopilot app does not work with the Mavic Pro 2
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from my Mavic Pro. The extra sensors and the Hasselblad camera are amazing. Just waiting for some decent weather to really put it through it’s paces. Only one negative is when loading DJIs Waypoints 2 it is necessary to connect the drone and the control every time you wish to plan or alter a mission. For that reason I have purchased the Litchi app which works perfectly and has the latest RTG (relevant to ground) built in.
customer_reviews.author: Rae.Jones47

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous faulty batteries
customer_reviews.text: As a professional drone pilot the M2p is my drone of course due to size and picture quality.... But recently I have noticed the batteries overheating and as a result the casing has expanded.... Rendering them unsafe to use as it risks them popping out the drone which makes them unsafe to fly with. This has happened to 3 batteries and will cost a fortune to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Dunk Scobie DO

customer_reviews.title: Wicked
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone, recommended by a friend. OMG I’m so glad I purchased it. Absolutely wicked and easy to operate. It’s hard to find anything to complain about but I wish the battery lasted longer. That’s it, buy one. Great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: One of mavic’s best products
customer_reviews.text: Really nice but if kit, excellent quality and picture/video is really good quality. Simple to use, plenty of sensors and goes like a billet in sports mode... I really like this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Keatek

customer_reviews.title: Top quality drone
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by it so far... Can't wait to get better weather to fly it in. Superb camera, you need one of these in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It’s a DJI drone. Great camera. Easy to fly. Well worth considering if you are in the market for a drone.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product but lead short to charge the controller up.
customer_reviews.text: Dji was good and well packed other than a lead short to charge the controller up.
customer_reviews.author: paul pugh

customer_reviews.title: Not value for ur money
customer_reviews.text: First of All the company claims 31min flight which is completely misleading I did test it with 20 different flight in weather friendly environment all the flights only reached up to 19 to 20 minutes Secondly during these test flight the drone was disconnected from the controller even though I was in open area and drone was even not for from controller which was really worried cuz I was in hills and if the drone lost I wouldn’t able to recover it from all the those difficult hilly areas and lost all money as I returned the product and waiting for my refund they are still investigating my claim NOT WORTH SPENDING 1349 on this product
customer_reviews.author: khaliq

customer_reviews.title: Please buy the pro not the zoom for better shots
customer_reviews.text: The drone is great and easy to fly but please for goodness sake , how can DJI justify the high price of the smart controller. This would greatly help to free your phone for its originally intended use
customer_reviews.author: Edward Baffoe

product_meta.title: DJI Mavic 2 Pro (UK) - Dron with Hasselblad Camera, 8 Km 1080p Video Transmission, 31-min Max Flight Time, Hyperlapse, HDR Video, f/2.8 f/11 Adjustable Aperture, Mavic 2 Pro Drone - Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Mavic 2 ProMade in Sweden Hasselblad cameras are renowned for their iconic ergonomic design uncompromising image quality and Swedish craftsmanship Since 1941 Hasselblad cameras have captured some of the world?s most iconic images ? including the first moon landing Co-engineered in partnership with Hasselblad after two years of tireless research the Mavic 2 Pro comes equipped with the all-new Hasselblad L1D-20c camera The L1D-20c possesses Hasselblad?s unique Hasselblad Natural Color Solution (HNCS) technology helping users to capture gorgeous 20-megapixel aerial shots in stunning color detail 1-inch CMOS SensorThe brand new 1-inch CMOS sensor has an active sensing area four times more effective than the original Mavic Pro The large sensor also means better performance in low-light environments with a more extensive ISO range max ISO lifted from 3200 to 12800 10-bit Dlog-M Color ProfileThe Mavic 2 Pro supports a 10-bit Dlog-M color profile that yields higher dynamic range for more flexibility in the grading room The system records over 1 billion colors (compared to the 16 million colors from traditional 8-bit color coding technologies) and retains more in-depth details in both highlights and shadows Now you can capture the subtlest gradations at sunset or sunrise leaving greater space for post-production HDR VideoWith 4K 10-bit HDR support the Mavic 2 Pro can be plugged into a 4K TV with HLG and will immediately play back footage with the right color tones including brighter highlights and increased contrast that make HDR so appealing Adjustable ApertureThe f/2 8-f/11 adjustable aperture delivers outstanding image quality both in high and low light environments When shooting in low light set the aperture to f/2 8 to allow more light in and to capture bright and clear photos When shooting in well-lit environments set the aperture to f/11 to lower the shutter speed and make your videos smoother
feature_bullets: MAVIC 2 PRO WITH HASSELBLAD CAMERA Mavic 2 Pro comes equipped with the Hasselblad L1D-20c camera helping users to capture gorgeous 20-megapixel aerial shots in stunning color detail
1-INCH CMOS SENSOR The brand new 1-inch CMOS sensor has an active sensing area allowing better performance in low-light environments with an extensive ISO range max ISO lifted from 3200 to 12800
HDR VIDEO With 4K 10-bit HDR support the Mavic 2 Pro can be plugged into a 4K TV with HLG and will immediately play back footage with the right color tones
ADJUSTABLE APERTURE The f/2 8-f/11 adjustable aperture delivers outstanding image quality both in high and low-light environments (f/2 8 in low-light environment f/11 in well-lit environment)
DJI Every idea every revolution that changes our world starts with a vision DJI offers creative people the tools they need to bring their ideas to life

specifications.Included Components: 1 Mavic 2 Pro Aircraft, 1 Mavic 2 Remote Controller, 1 Mavic 2 Intelligent Flight Battery, 3 Mavic 2 Low-Noise Propellers
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
